definition: A device typically found outdoors, providing artificial illumination during nighttime in urban areas, commonly mounted on poles along roads and sidewalks. It is primarily used to enhance visibility and ensure safety for pedestrians and vehicles.

examples.german: Die Straßenlaterne leuchtet die ganze Nacht.
examples.english: The street lamp lights up the whole night.
The street lamp was just repaired.

examples.german: Ich habe meine Taschenlampe vergessen, aber zum Glück gibt es eine Straßenlaterne.
examples.english: I forgot my flashlight, but luckily there is a street lamp.

examples.german: Die Straßenlaterne spendet ein warmes Licht.
examples.english: The street lamp emits a warm light.
